name: Mines (Cosmin Calian)
description:
"Mines"

It's just a simple game where you test your luck. Try to avoid mines and if you really want to have fun, spawn 24 mines and try to find the only spot that is not a mine.
Every time you start the game you will have 100 points, if you ran out of points just restart the game. You can use the "+" and "-" buttons to adjust first the number of bombs and then the bet. For every spot that you click and it's not a mine, you will get some points, but if you click on a mine you lose your bet, so be careful and cashout often and don't risk it, unless you want to have fun.
